title: My hobbies
subtitle: Here is how I like to spend my free time.

title: Sports
description: As someone who played tennis as a tween, competitive cricket as a teen, and football and table tennis regularly in my 20s, my brain has been wired to thrive on sports. I enjoy both watching sports and playing on the weekends.

title: Music & Guitar
description: Playing guitar helps me unwind. I find it very satisfying when I get a song or a riff right after hours, sometimes days, of practice. Learning guitar taught me that delayed gratification is the best kind of gratification.

title: Fiction (Movies, Shows & Books)
description: I love quirky, avant-garde cinema, shows and books that challenge conventional storytelling. Especially sci-fi and dystopian genres.

title: Video Games
description: I enjoy playing immersive story-driven games - especially indie games with heart (Hollow Knight, Hades, etc.) I grew up on NFS and the Batman Arkham series. Racing games are a go-to for me to this day. Speaking of racing...

title: Sim Racing
description: Racing in the virtual world satisfies my need for speed and precision. As a petrolhead and motorsports enthusiast, sim racing is an addiction I sometimes need to force myself out of in order to get some sleep.
